atlassian_mcp_server_creation.critical_rule:
ALWAYS create Atlassian MCP server configuration when Atlassian integration is requested. MCP server configuration goes in .roo/mcp.json (per-project), NEVER in .vscode/settings.json.
No alternative approaches allowed - MCP server is the standard for Roo/Claude Atlassian integration.
atlassian_mcp_server_creation.overview: Complete Atlassian MCP server creation rules and workflow defined in: ../../sdlc/shared/universal/atlassian-mcp-server-creation.md
atlassian_mcp_server_creation.includes: - Core principle and enforcement level - Mandatory behavior rules - Trigger scenarios (explicit, implicit, workflow integration) - Implementation workflow (6 steps) - Configuration templates (macOS, Windows, Linux, EC2) - Mode-specific behaviors - Quality assurance checklist - Common mistakes prevention - Integration with other universal rules - Troubleshooting patterns - User education component

applies_to.roo: ALL Roo modes when Atlassian integration needed
applies_to.claude: ALL Claude agents when Atlassian integration needed
